articles.description: Build-up to Euro 2024 as Scotland train for the final time before their opener against Germany while England continue preparations, plus all the latest football and transfer news.
articles.title: Euro 2024 build-up: Scotland and England in training before opener

articles.description: Follow live text updates from day one of the US Open at Pinehurst in North Carolina.
articles.title: US Open LIVE round one: Woods, Koepka, Fitzpatrick and Rose out early at Pinehurst

articles.description: Borussia Dortmund part company with manager Edin Terzic after he asks the club "to terminate his contract with immediate effect".
articles.title: Edin Terzic: Borussia Dortmund part company with manager

articles.description: Italian club AC Milan appoint Paulo Fonseca as their new manager on a three-year deal.
articles.title: AC Milan: Former Lille boss Paulo Fonseca appointed new manager of Milan

articles.description: Wayne Rooney and Michael Owen share their experiences of enjoying breakthrough major tournaments with England.
articles.title: Wayne Rooney and Michael Owen: How it feels to be an England prodigy

articles.description: Jayson Tatum and Jaylen Brown help the Boston Celtics hold off a Dallas Mavericks fightback to take a 3-0 lead in the NBA finals.
articles.title: NBA Finals: Jayson Tatum stars as Boston Celtics go 3-0 up against Dallas Mavericks

articles.description: Sherfane Rutherford hits a sublime unbeaten 68 as West Indies beat New Zealand by 13 runs to book their place in the T20 World Cup Super 8s.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: West Indies beat New Zealand to reach Super 8s

articles.description: England defender John Stones resumes training after spending Wednesday isolated in his hotel room with a sickness bug.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England's John Stones returns to training after illness

articles.description: Meet light-heavyweight Ben Whittaker, who woke up to millions of hits on his Instagram after uploading a video of one of his knockouts.
articles.title: Chris Billam-Smith vs Richard Riakporhe: Ben Whittaker, the 58m social media star chasing greatness

articles.description: The New England Patriots are to retire Tom Brady's number 12 shirt and build a statue of their legendary former quarterback.
articles.title: Tom Brady: New England Patriots to retire quarterback's number 12 shirt
